extendedInfo.description: English Word Practice allows you to practice 500 very common english words. The following exercises are available:- Type spoken word with hint in chosen language- Type spoken word without a hint.- Translate written word from your native languages (dutch, french, german or spanish)- Speak written word using speech recognition technology.The words are provided in batches of 10. Only if 8 words are handled correctly, you are allowed to go to the next level.In the future more words will be added to the application.
